title: N88 Duke's Terrors of America "Out at First".

posts.post_title: N88 Duke's Terrors of America "Out at First".
posts.post_content:
FS is this cool card, from the N88 Duke's terrors of America set. 50 card set, that features a few w a baseball motif, this one included.  Cool, inexpensive 19th century card. Ex or so overall as evidenced.

HE IS SOLD Thanks. Scott.
